description: Update digital fleet truck trailer or tractor assignments.
permissions: Allowed for admins; otherwise the user must be a member of the broker associated with the digital fleet truck.
side_effects: Updates the digital fleet truck tractor and/or trailer relationships; providing an empty string clears the assignment.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --tractor or --trailer must be provided; otherwise the request is rejected.

flags.name: --tractor
flags.validation: Use an empty string to clear the tractor assignment.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.validation: Use an empty string to clear the trailer assignment.
